page.title: 06My Dad's Employment
page.content: My dad wakes at quarter past six in the morning. At twenty past seven he leaves for Nottingham which is 22 miles from Teversal and he arrives at work at eight o'clock . For transport he travels in an Avenger car for forty minutes via the M1 motorway. My dad works in Information Systems at Boots in Nottingham. He programs main-frame computers. He sometimes creates new programs but ammending programs which have gone wrong is his main occupation. My dad works at Boots' head office at a big desk by a computer terminal. He has a forty five minute lunch break then it is back to the "grindstone" till a quarter past four. He gets back home between ten to five and twenty past five. For recreation in the evenings my dad often goes weightlifting for an hour and then he comes home and plays with
